## Asset pricing
One important goal in asset pricing

- How do we explain the variation in asset returns?

No-arbitrage pricing theory

- Assets are priced through the stochastic discount
  factor

  (SDF, also known as pricing kernel)

## SDF estimation

However, how do we estimate the SDF?

1. Choose the right factors (data features)
1. Select the right portfolio (combination of
   individual assets)
1. Estimate the functional form
